name: Christmas Eve: Midnight's Call HD - A Holiday Hidden Object Adventure
name_original: Christmas Eve: Midnight's Call HD - A Holiday Hidden Object Adventure
description:
Play the trial for FREE! Pay once & complete the adventure!

Snow Hill is a magical town that preserves the Spirit of Christmas for the whole world. But now an evil sorceress threatens to plunge Snow Hill into eternal darkness! Do you have what it takes to save Christmas?

• DO YOU HAVE WHAT IT TAKES TO SAVE CHRISTMAS?
You lost your sister in an accident on the ice when you were kids and this event has haunted you ever since.

• JUMP INTO A SNOWY ADVENTURE
Through a chance encounter, you are whisked away to a place that preserves the spirit of Christmas for the whole world!

• TAKE ON AN ICY SORCERESS
An evil sorceress has frozen all of the people in Snow Hill and now it’s up to you to undo her wicked spell. Search for hidden objects in snowy landscapes and solve intriguing puzzles and mini-games to save Christmas!

• BATTLE THE ANCIENT EVIL OF THE BLACK SWAN IN THE BONUS GAME
Collect hidden gifts scattered throughout your adventure. Then enjoy festive extras such as frosty wallpaper scenes, concept art, and more!
